theDragonknight:FrostbitePower.NAME: Arc Conduit
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStorm Sigils will damage this in addition to other targets.

theDragonknight:RotPower.NAME: Scarlet Rot
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of its turn loses HP equal to #b50% of it's [theDragonknight:PoisonIcon]

theDragonknight:DragonscalesPower.NAME: Dragonblood
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves #yDraconic Sigils, damage and #yBlock gain of #yDraconic cards by #b

theDragonknight:ProfaneDivitation.NAME: Profane Divination
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, guess the type of the top
of your draw pile, if you guess correct deal #b
damage to all enemies, otherwise #yExhaust it.
